name: generic-copilot
description: An extension that integrates Vercel AI SDK compatible inference Providers into GitHub Copilot Chat

commands.title: GenericCopilot: Set Generic Compatible Multi-Provider API key

id.description: Canonical provider ID (lowercase, used as owned_by and for API key storage).

baseUrl.description: (Optional) Base URL for the provider's API endpoint.  Override built-in defaults.

headers.description: (Optional) Custom HTTP headers to include in requests to this provider.

providerSpecificOptions.description: (Optional) Provider-specific options as a JSON object.

generic-copilot.providers.description: A list of provider configurations. Models can reference providers to inherit baseUrl. Use the Configuration GUI or edit in settings.json.

slug.description: (Required) Slug for the model as defined by the provider (e.g., 'gpt-4o', 'claude-3').

provider.description: (Required) Reference to a provider ID. Allows inheriting the API key and baseURL and headers

use_for_autocomplete.description: (Optional) Whether to use this model for autocomplete features.

retries.description: (Optional) Number of retries for failed requests. Defaults to 3.

model_properties.description: (Optional) Model properties including context_length, family, owned_by, etc.

context_length.description: Model support context length. Default is 128000.

family.description: (Optional) Model family (e.g., 'gpt-4', 'claude-3', 'gemini'). Enables model-specific optimizations and behaviors. Defaults to 'generic' if not specified.

litellm_api_type.description: (Optional) LiteLLM API type. Required only when using the 'litellm' provider type. Specifies which underlying API the LiteLLM provider should use for this model.

model_parameters.description: (Optional) Model parameters including temperature, max_tokens, reasoning settings, etc.

temperature.description: Sampling temperature (range: [0, 2]). Lower values make output more deterministic, higher values make it more creative. Default is 1.

extra.description: Extra request parameters that will be used in /chat/completions.

generic-copilot.models.description: A list of model configurations. Use the Configuration GUI or edit in settings.json.

generic-copilot.delay.description: Fixed delay in milliseconds between consecutive requests. Default is 0 (no delay).

generic-copilot.logLevel.description: Set the logging level for the extension (example dropdown setting).
enumDescriptions: Show informational messages, warnings, and errors
Show all messages including debug information

scripts.download-api: npx dts dev && mv vscode.proposed.*.ts src
scripts.compile:all: tsc -p ./ && cd webview-ui && npm run compile
scripts.package: npm run compile:all && vsce package --out generic-copilot.vsix
